Package org.modelio.vbasic.net

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ISslUntrustedServerFixer
    Service interface to use when SSL certificate validation for a server fails with a SSLHandshakeException.
    IUriConnectionFactory
    Same as URLStreamHandler but for URIs.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApacheUriConnection
    HTTP/HTTPS URI support using Apache HTTP client library.
    ApacheUriConnection.ApacheUriConnectionFactory
    URI connection factory.
    CachedUriFile
    Allows to cache a file referenced by an URI in a local directory.
    SslManager
    Creates and configure a customized SSLContext to manage https URIs.
    UriConnection
    Same as URLConnection but for URI.
    UriConnections
    Same as URLStreamHandlerFactory but here we can add easily other stream handlers.
    UriPathAccess
    Allows to access to an URI as a Path.
    UriUtils
    Utilities about URI.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidCertificateException
    Extends CertificateException to include the invalid certificate chain.
    UriAuthenticationException
    Indicates that: the caller must first authenticate to the target using an IAuthData.
